    LD matrix

    ld_matrix.Rmd

    Setup

    See the setup process for the PLINK2 executable and reference file in the Clumping vignette.

    library(genepi.utils)

# the gwas data
gwas <- data.table::fread(system.file("extdata", "example2_gwas_sumstats.tsv", package="genepi.utils"))

# ensure annotated with rsID
gwas <- standardise_gwas(gwas, input_format="ns_map", build="GRCh37", populate_rsid="b37_dbsnp156")
#> Standardising GWAS ...
#> RSID mapping...
#> Chromosomes to process:  10
#> RSID coverage 100% (10/10), of which 0% (0/10) where found flipping alleles

# check path to reference
which_1000G_reference("GRCh37")
#> [1] "/Users/xx20081/Documents/local_data/genome_reference/ref_1000GP_phase3_plink/all_phase3_nodup"

# check path to plink2 executable
which_plink2()
#> [1] "/usr/local/plink/plink2"

    LD matrix

    Generate the LD matrix.

    # produce LD matrix 
ld_mat <- ld_matrix(gwas[1:9, "RSID"],
                    plink2    = genepi.utils::which_plink2(),
                    plink_ref = genepi.utils::which_1000G_reference(build="GRCh37"))

# view result
print(ld_mat)
#>            rs7899632 rs61875309 rs12258651 rs1359508 rs1048754 rs3750595
#> rs7899632   1.000000  -0.352729   0.464422 -0.605224 -0.351842  0.999186
#> rs61875309 -0.352729   1.000000  -0.163815 -0.273537  0.997485 -0.352442

    Harmonise data against LD matrix alleles 

    # harmonised data 
harm <- harmonise(gwas, data.table::copy(gwas), gwas1_trait="exposure", gwas2_trait="outcome", merge=c("RSID"="RSID"))

# mess up the alleles vs reference
harm <- harm[RSID_exposure=="rs7899632", c("EA_exposure","EA_outcome","OA_exposure","OA_outcome") := list("A","A","G","G")]
harm[RSID_exposure=="rs7899632", ][]
#> Key: <RSID_exposure>
#>            SNP_exposure          SNP_outcome CHR_exposure CHR_outcome
#>                  <char>               <char>       <char>      <char>
#> 1: 10:100000625[b37]A,G 10:100000625[b37]A,G           10          10
#>    BP_exposure BP_outcome EA_exposure EA_outcome OA_exposure OA_outcome
#>          <int>      <int>      <char>     <char>      <char>     <char>
#> 1:   100000625  100000625           A          A           G          G
#>    EAF_exposure EAF_outcome BETA_exposure BETA_outcome P_exposure P_outcome
#>           <num>       <num>         <num>        <num>      <num>     <num>
#> 1:      7.1e-05     7.1e-05        -0.037       -0.037      0.781     0.781
#>    palindromic   keep RSID_exposure SE_exposure SE_outcome RSID_outcome
#>         <lgcl> <lgcl>        <char>       <num>      <num>       <char>
#> 1:       FALSE   TRUE     rs7899632       0.137      0.137    rs7899632

# re-harmonise
harm_result <- harmonise_ld_dat(harm, ld_mat, gwas1_trait="exposure", gwas2_trait="outcome")

# harmonised data
harm_result[["harm"]][RSID_exposure=="rs7899632", ][]
#>            SNP_exposure          SNP_outcome CHR_exposure CHR_outcome
#>                  <char>               <char>       <char>      <char>
#> 1: 10:100000625[b37]A,G 10:100000625[b37]A,G           10          10
#>    BP_exposure BP_outcome EA_exposure EA_outcome OA_exposure OA_outcome
#>          <int>      <int>      <char>     <char>      <char>     <char>
#> 1:   100000625  100000625           G          G           A          A
#>    EAF_exposure EAF_outcome BETA_exposure BETA_outcome P_exposure P_outcome
#>           <num>       <num>         <num>        <num>      <num>     <num>
#> 1:     0.999929    0.999929         0.037        0.037      0.781     0.781
#>    palindromic   keep RSID_exposure SE_exposure SE_outcome RSID_outcome CHR_LD
#>         <lgcl> <lgcl>        <char>       <num>      <num>       <char>  <int>
#> 1:       FALSE   TRUE     rs7899632       0.137      0.137    rs7899632     10
#>        BP_LD REF_LD ALT_LD keep_ld
#>        <int> <char> <char>  <lgcl>
#> 1: 100000625      A      G    TRUE

# LD matrix
harm_result[["ld_mat"]]
